headline: Should You Invest in Synopsys (SNPS) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Synopsys (SNPS) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
